content.query:
CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL [sqlondemand]
--WITH IDENTITY='SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE',  
--SECRET = 'ejm+47WgjfejH82fWDCDNE9r19U5NqfuCR3pvyG322AgaM/+qUk46chAQBgi3XxnJd7aJC/vqW/1f9+3K2Ps5Q=='
WITH IDENTITY='Managed Identity'
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE SqlOnDemandDemo WITH (
    LOCATION = 'https://bluebadgehdiadls.blob.core.windows.net/bluebadgehdiadls'
    ,CREDENTIAL = sqlondemand
);
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT QuotedCsvWithHeaderFormat
WITH (  
    FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
    FORMAT_OPTIONS ( FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',', STRING_DELIMITER = '"', FIRST_ROW = 2   )
);
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE MovieDB
(
    id int,
    title VARCHAR(100),
    genre VARCHAR(100),
    year SMALLINT,
    rating SMALLINT,
    rottentomato SMALLINT
)
WITH (
    LOCATION = 'example/data/MoviesDBFresh.csv',
    DATA_SOURCE = sqlondemanddemo,
    FILE_FORMAT = QuotedCSVWithHeaderFormat
);

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM MovieDB

DROP EXTERNAL TABLE MovieDB
DROP EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT QuotedCSVWithHeaderFormat
DROP EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE SqlOnDemandDemo
DROP DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL [sqlondemand]
